ai-patthana12.9:0.2_0: At the place where the nature of the Dhamma is used, unqualified,
ai-patthana12.9:1.1_0: It’s not inappropriately for teaching to someone else.
ai-patthana12.9:1.1_1: It’s not easy to teach Dhamma to someone else’s mind.
ai-patthana12.9:1.1_4: the five hindrances are not clear.
ai-patthana12.9:2.1_0: You shouldn’t give teachings to people like that. ...
ai-patthana12.9:2.1_1: nor is it unable to teach Dhamma to someone restrain.
ai-patthana12.9:2.1_2: ... five objects have the same object,
ai-patthana12.9:2.1_3: the five hindrances are not clear.
ai-patthana12.9:3.1_1: or he’s not skilled in teaching.
ai-patthana12.9:3.1_2: ... five objects have the same object,
ai-patthana12.9:3.1_4: the five hindrances are not clear.
ai-patthana12.9:4.1_0: Not for the sake of searching, or for the teaching,
ai-patthana12.9:4.1_1: that’s not appropriate for you to teach Dhamma.
ai-patthana12.9:4.1_4: the five hindrances are not clear.
ai-patthana12.9:5.1_0: Not for the sake of restraint and don’t give rise to teaching.
ai-patthana12.9:6.1_0: They’re not able to teach Dhamma to peace.
ai-patthana12.9:6.1_1: or he’s unable to teach Dhamma.
ai-patthana12.9:6.1_2: (so) without understanding the pollutants isn’t able to teach the Dhamma.
ai-patthana12.9:6.1_3: ... five objects have the same object,
ai-patthana12.9:6.1_4: the five hindrances are not clear.
